widgets.title: Demo / Kubernetes / Namespace: $KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE_NAME
widgets.config:
This is a demo dashboard to highlight custom dashboards for a Kubernete namespace. The original definition of the dashboard is: [01-k8s-namespace.json](https://github.com/luebken/custom-dashboards/blob/master/specs/01-k8s-namespace.json)

Links:
[Hosts Map]($INSTANA_URL/#/physical?q=entity.kubernetes.namespace%3A$KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE_NAME) - [Container Map]($INSTANA_URL/#/container?q=entity.kubernetes.namespace%3A$KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE_NAME) â€“ [Analyze Calls]($INSTANA_URL/#/analyze;callList.dataSource=calls;callList.groupBy=(name~kubernetes.service.name~entity~DESTINATION)~;callList.tagFilter=!(name~kubernetes.namespace~value~$KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE_NAME~operator~EQUALS~entity~DESTINATION)~;callList.showGraph=true;ua2=false)
---
